!Warrior's Grave: It is not a complex melody, but perhaps an outsider such as yourself finds it more difficult to sing than a born Elrokian warrior who has heard it from birth. Concentrate! You must try again -- the fate of this island depends on it! Remember, you must perfectly sing every single scale of each of the 3 verses. [Quest _126_IntheNameofEvilPart2 reply_44|Sing the warrior song again.]
